title: My Portfolio
subtitle: Showcasing My Dev Journey
description: üíº My portfolio serves as a comprehensive display of my skills and projects, documenting my learning journey through various initiatives. In addition to showcasing the technologies I've worked with, it features a modern design aesthetic, aiming to create a visually engaging user experience.

title: Custom Report
subtitle: Playwright and Next.js Driven Custom Reporting Scripts
description: ‚öôÔ∏è As a demonstration of cutting-edge testing technologies, 'Demo Report' utilizes Playwright, Next.js, Prisma, and TypeScript to offer robust and flexible testing solutions. This project underscores the integration of automated testing scripts with MongoDB for dynamic data handling and customized report generation, highlighting innovations in software quality assurance.

title: Boston Heat Pump Accelerator
subtitle: Green Energy in Boston
description: üåÜ As a Frontend Developer, I was tasked with implementing the public-facing pages, collaborating closely with a team of UX and Marketing professionals. The BHPA project is dedicated to increasing access to heat pumps in Boston, aiding in cost reduction and the shift towards low-carbon technology, all while maintaining an unbiased stance through independent funding. I have recently integrated internationalization features to enhance accessibility and user experience across various languages.

title: Gemini AI Chatbot
subtitle: Specialized Predictive Support for Professional Endeavors
description: ü§ñ The Gemini AI Chatbot is a cutting-edge tool designed to provide specialized support for inquiries related to Thiago Bardini's professional career. Engineered with Gemini AI, this chatbot analyzes queries to deliver precise and relevant information efficiently. If a query is outside the scope of provided data, the chatbot is programmed not just to refer back to guidelines but to guide users towards obtaining the necessary assistance.

title: Mini Market
subtitle: Your Online Grocery Store
description: üõí Mini Market is a modern e-commerce platform designed to demonstrate the use of Firebase Realtime Database, Stripe API, and React JS. It features real-time updates and secure payments, showcasing my skills in full-stack application development. Recently enhanced with the GlobalLink GO script for website translation, it provides a multilingual shopping experience while also serving as a platform for QA automation testing at TransPerfect.

title: LottoNest
subtitle: Lottery Number Verifier
description: üé∞ LottoNest serves as a demonstration of using Firebase Firestore Database and Firebase Authentication with React JS and the react-webcam library. Quickly verify Mega Millions numbers via camera or manual input. The project features a seamless UI with detailed ticket views, aiming to make lottery checks fast and enjoyable.
